Nightstrike:

Nightstrike avoided Sidewipe attack ans shot him 25 times


--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> OOC: I kinda am not at my house... =)
> 
> --- Astroblast / Rippersnapper ---
> 
> Astroblast covers his optics, as Torca's nails riddle him, some 
> sticking into his armour slightly, some deflecting away. One nail 
> pierced a join on his left arm, disabling most movement from that 
> side. He shakes his head, brushing nails off him. "Stupid 
Maximals!" 
> Astroblast starts running towards Torca and Klant, firing twice 
from 
> his rifle, and twice from his twin chin lasers, both times at the 
> originator of the nails, Torca.
> 
> --------------------------------------------
> 
> Rippersnapper leaps backwards away from Orion, but he isn't that 
> lucky, Orion's sword cuts a nice groove in his nose. "Aiiee," 
> Rippersnapper's expression changes from one of shock, to one of 
pure 
> animalistic anger. "Rippersnapper will tear apart stinging 
Maximal!" 
> Rippersnapper rushes Orion, fireing another missile, mechafluid 
> leaking from his slash.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > OOC: Hey, Jer, you haven't posted for Ratchet attacking Sinnertwin
> (post # 
> > 34699).  And rauq, i don' think you posted for Torca attacking 
> > Astroblast(post # 34744) and Orion attacking Rippersnapper(post # 
> 34713).
